intro: In the Valley of Shining Stars, magic lights up every corner and guides ponies in the discovery of their true destiny.
description:
In this visual novel, join Aurora Light, a young pony with a restless spirit, on an unforgettable adventure filled with magic and discovery. Her dream is to find her purpose, but the path is not always easy.

When an unexpected event shakes the harmony of the valley, Aurora Light and her friends will travel beyond the known, exploring amazing landscapes, facing magical challenges, and discovering ancient secrets that will change their lives.

Experience an exciting story full of friendship, bravery, and self-discovery!

What awaits you in Aurora Light:

· A great story of adventure and values.
· Many endearing and fun characters.
· Wonderful and colorful backgrounds that will transport you to a magical world.
· Beautiful music that will make every moment unforgettable.

Discover the magic of Aurora Light now!
